venue.maraya_asher: Maraya, Ashar Valley, AlUla, Saudi Arabia

theme.explore_archaeological: Exploring archaeological paradoxes, practices, and dilemmas.
theme.explore_wisdom: Exploring wisdom of the past which has much to teach us, and highlighting challenges that need to be overcome.
theme.explore_past: Exploring the past as a universal right by traversing topics of diversity, disability,and financial access to heritage.
theme.exploring_the_intricate: Exploring the intricate relationship we have with our heritage and connection to the past, and how archaeology shapes our personal and shared identities in an increasingly globalized world.
